category.description: Used to categorize the order, useful for the OM system, such as: Broadband, TVOption

completionDate.description: Effective delivery date amended by the provider

description.description: A free-text description of the service order

expectedCompletionDate.description: Expected delivery date amended by the provider

externalId.description: ID given by the consumer to facilitate searches

note.description: Extra-information about the order; e.g. useful to add extra delivery information that could be useful for a human process

notificationContact.description: Contact attached to the order to send back information regarding this order

orderItem.description: A list of service order items to be processed by this order

orderRelationship.description: A list of service orders related to this order (e.g. prerequisite, dependent on)

priority.description: Can be used by consumers to prioritize orders in a Service Order Management system

relatedParty.description: A list of parties which are involved in this order and the role they are playing

requestedCompletionDate.description: Requested delivery date from the requestors perspective

requestedStartDate.description: Order start date wished by the requestor

startDate.description: Date when the order was started for processing

state.description: State of the order: described in the state-machine diagram
